name: A Set of Pitchblack Greaves
data: It increases the users strength strongly.
It increases the users dexterity an average amount.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has great armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives great bonus to the spell 'darkness'.
Black Greaves make it easier to call for darkness.
